thread.title: "The fight is not over": Cosby's attorney

title: "The fight is not over": Cosby's attorney
text:
"The fight is not over": Cosby's attorney 8:06pm EDT - 01:38
Bill Cosby's attorney Tom Mesereau vows to keep fighting after the comedian was found guilty on all three counts in his sexual assault retrial. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
